representation_information.name: ISO/IEC 13818. Information technology -- Generic coding of moving pictures and associated audio information (formal name) MPEG-2 (common name)
representation_information.description: The family of MPEG-2 encodings were initially developed to serve the transmission of compressed television programs via broadcast, cablecast, and satellite, and subsequently adopted for DVD production and for some online delivery systems. Picture, sound, and data elements consist of streams, i.e., the format's sequences of encoded bytes.
